html:
gladness/joy is taken away. The lamentation continues, and the happiness shown in the gladness, joy, singing, and shouting normally connected with harvest, blessings, and peaceful conditions is gone.

in the vineyards there shall be no singing, neither…shouting. The customary singing and joyful shouting that accompany the grape treaders are gone; lamenting replaces them.

treaders shall tread out no wine in their presses. Workers will cease their laboring and the normal economy will be disrupted.

I have made their vintage shouting to cease. The joy that attends the bounteous harvest is replaced with mourning, because of the judgments of the Lord.
